draw_prompt: A vibrant digital painting of Copenhagen harbor at sunset, featuring the iconic Little Mermaid statue on a rock, red-and-white Danish flags fluttering on sailing boats, rows of pastel-colored Nordic buildings with stepped gables, bicycles parked by cobblestone streets, and green wind turbines visible in the distant coastline, rendered in soft watercolor textures with a fairytale atmosphere.
